```{r, results="asis"}
setwd(here("tables"))
mytable <- read_csv("table4.csv")
mytable <- mytable[,-1]
mytable$Agreeableness[1:6] <- paste("\\textbf{",mytable$Agreeableness[1:6], "}", sep="")
mytable$Conscientiousness[7:15] <- paste("\\textbf{",mytable$Conscientiousness[7:15], "}", sep="")
mytable$Extraversion[16:23] <- paste("\\textbf{",mytable$Extraversion[16:23], "}", sep="")
mytable$Neuroticism[24:30] <- paste("\\textbf{",mytable$Neuroticism[24:30], "}", sep="")
mytable$Openness[31:38] <- paste("\\textbf{",mytable$Openness[31:38], "}", sep="")
colnames(mytable)[1]<-"Facet"


# print(xtable(mytable, caption="ESEM factor scores USA sample"),include.rownames=FALSE, size="\\fontsize{9.5pt}{9pt}\\selectfont", caption.placement = "top",sanitize.text.function=Hmisc::latexTranslate)

kable(mytable, booktabs=T, escape=F, linesep="", align="l", caption = "Table 4. ESEM factor scores USA sample")
```
